EmailTemplate.name: Event - Partner Day 2015.Email - 1 Day Reminder - Partner Day
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation: Partner Day 2015
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Don’t forget, Partner Day starts tomorrow at 1:30 PM! We are looking forward to welcoming you to an inspiring day discussing the future of Tricentis and software testing, followed by dinner, drinks, and networking.
Location: Novomatic Forum <http://www.novomaticforum.com> Friedrichstraße 7 1010 Wien
<https://www.google.at/maps/dir/48.2013086,16.3688942/Novomatic+Forum,+Friedrichstra%C3%9Fe,+Wien/@48.2003768,16.36739,18z/data=!4m9!4m8!1m0!1m5!1m1!1s0x476d0784a766a0f3:0xd6b5de954061f676!2m2!1d16.36641!2d48.200036!3e2>
How to get there: The Novomatic Forum is easily accessible by public transportation. Simply take the U1 (Red), U2 (Purple) or U4 (Green) subway line to Karlsplatz, Exit Oper and a 3 minutes walk.
Parking Information: For those arriving by car, by the Novomatic Forum is parking lot. The next public parking is at Winpark Garage.
Parking: WIPARK Garage <http://www.wipark.at> Operngasse 13 1040 Wien
See you soon in Vienna!
Best Regards,
Your Tricentis Events Team
